message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're a savvy buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in talks, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my costs. I can offer it to you for $115.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay $110 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to meet you at $112. This is as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $110 for it.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm at my minimum price of $110, and I'm not budging. If you're serious about the product, this is the best I can do.
